name: Farmers Market Schedule
description: Find out when and where local farmers markets are happening.

name: Cooking Classes
description: Learn new culinary skills from local chefs.

name: Restaurant Week
description: Explore special menus and deals at participating restaurants.

name: Food Truck Festival
description: Enjoy a variety of cuisines from food trucks gathered in one location.

name: Wine Tasting Events
description: Sample wines from local vineyards and wineries.

name: Community Potluck
description: Bring a dish to share with neighbors and enjoy a meal together.

name: Cookbook Club Meetings
description: Discuss and sample recipes from a chosen cookbook each month.

name: Gardening Workshops
description: Learn about growing your own fruits and vegetables.

name: Culinary Tours
description: Explore local eateries and taste their specialties.

name: Healthy Eating Seminars
description: Get tips on nutrition and healthy eating habits.

name: Local Brewery Tours
description: Explore the local craft beer scene with guided brewery tours.

name: Community Cookbook Exchange
description: Share your favorite recipes and discover new ones from fellow community members.
